class.name: Mixin
class.description: A class which extends the run-time functionality of objects that use [MixinScript]. All scripts added to [MixinScript] must inherit from [Mixin]. [b]Warning:[/b] [Mixin] objects are instantiated internally and cannot be used as a [Node] in the scene tree. Do not instantiate [Mixin] objects manually.

members.member: The object that uses this mixin to drive its own behavior. You can reference the [code]owner[/code] from within a mixin, use properties and call methods on the [code]owner[/code] that are defined in other mixin scripts.
